content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://airportdemoadls.dfs.core.windows.net/airportdemofilesystem/airport-codes.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT DISTINCT type
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://airportdemoadls.dfs.core.windows.net/airportdemofilesystem/airport-codes.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://airportdemoadls.dfs.core.windows.net/airportdemofilesystem/airport-codes.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
